Title: Up in the Air
Overview: Corporate downsizing expert Ryan Bingham spends his life in planes, airports, and hotels, but just as he’s about to reach a milestone of ten million frequent flyer miles, he meets a woman who causes him to rethink his transient life.
Tagline: The story of a man ready to make a connection.
Keywords: suitcase, business, omaha, on the road, downsizing, cross country, duringcreditsstinger
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Rickshaw Productions, Cold Spring Pictures, Montecito Picture Company, The, DW Studios, Right of Way Films
Cast: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, Anna Kendrick
